WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not enough information, user had an issue that shouldn't exist but never responded after OP
WorkItem.Description:
Description of the Feature Request : I can disable my dranei racial buff in Rawr, and it modifies the way the optimiser actually optimises my stuff. Could it be possible to force the racial buffs beeing enabled, so that users cannot disable self racial buffs before optimisation ? Eventually even add a simple feature to re-enable all the default buffs (racials & class buffs), the same way we can "disable all buffs" in the software. It would avoid many optimisation mistakes, I guess.
Suggestion for Fix : mentionned. 
Any Additional Information : none. 
Details : mentionned.

Comments.Message: uhh where is this NOT working for you? on most models, if you are a draenei it will force it on with each action you take (button click that alters the character in any way).
